CustomField.description: ~USCDI v1 CCDA - Care Plan Goals & Instructions
CustomField.label: Care Plan 1 Goal

value.fullName: Get a Chest X-ray done on 6/23/2015 showing the Lower Respiratory Tract Structure.
value.label: Get a Chest X-ray done on 6/23/2015 showing the Lower Respiratory Tract Structure.

value.fullName: Take Clindamycin 300mg three times a day as needed if pain does not subside/
value.label: Take Clindamycin 300mg three times a day as needed if pain does not subside/

value.fullName: Schedule follow on visit with Neighborhood Physicians Practice on 7/1/2015.
value.label: Schedule follow on visit with Neighborhood Physicians Practice on 7/1/2015.

value.fullName: Get rid of intermittent fever that is occurring every few weeks.
value.label: Get rid of intermittent fever that is occurring every few weeks.

value.fullName: Need to gain more energy to do regular activities
value.label: Need to gain more energy to do regular activities

value.fullName: Schedule a visit for next year.
value.label: Schedule a visit for next year.

value.fullName: In case of high fever, take Tylenol as needed
value.label: In case of high fever, take Tylenol as needed
